source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenery video features a slow pan to the left across a quiet residential street corner in Japan. The shot begins on the entrance of a traditional-style house before revealing more of the neighborhood, including lush greenery and a street mirror. The scene is set on a bright, sunny day.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This scenery video features a slow pan to the left across a quiet residential street corner in Japan. The shot begins on the entrance of a traditional-style house before revealing more of the neighborhood, including lush greenery and a street mirror. The scene is set on a bright, sunny day.

generated_critique: The caption is mostly accurate but can be improved for directness and conciseness. The introductory phrase "This scenery video features" is unnecessary and should be removed to describe the camera's motion directly (e.g., "The camera slowly pans..."). The subjective adjective "quiet" should be omitted. For better flow, the final sentence, "The scene is set on a bright, sunny day," can be integrated into the main description rather than standing alone.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: The camera slowly pans to the left across a residential street corner in Japan on a bright, sunny day. The shot begins on the entrance of a traditional-style house before revealing more of the neighborhood, including lush greenery and a street mirror.
